changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists fact_commission ( id bigserial primary key,
account_id bigint not null, source_platform text not null, source_event_id text not null,
order_id text, dim_product_id bigint, warehouse_id bigint, category_id bigint,
operation_date date not null, commission_type text not null, amount numeric(18, 2) not null, currency text not null,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint uq_fact_commission_source unique (account_id, source_platform, source_event_id, commission_type) );
create index if not exists idx_fact_commission_account_date on fact_commission (account_id, operation_date);
create index if not exists idx_fact_commission_product on fact_commission (dim_product_id);
create index if not exists idx_fact_commission_order on fact_commission (order_id);
